key_events.description: Azir shuffle catches 3, C9 wins 4-1 at dragon
Thresh hook on Viego leads to Baron

transcript:
Caster 1: Welcome to the LCS Finals! Cloud9 vs Team Liquid!
Caster 2: C9 drafts scaling with Jinx and Azir. Liquid goes early game.
Caster 1: 5 minutes in, first blood to Liquid! Viego catches Azir.
Caster 2: Liquid is executing their gameplan perfectly.
Caster 1: 15 minutes, Liquid leads by 1500 gold.
Caster 2: But here comes the dragon fight!
Caster 1: AZIR SHUFFLE! He catches THREE members!
Caster 2: Cloud9 wins the fight 4-1! What a turnaround!
Caster 1: 25 minutes, Baron is up. Thresh lands the hook!
Caster 2: That's Baron for Cloud9! The comeback is real!
Caster 1: Dragon Soul to Cloud9! They push for the win!
Caster 2: PENTAKILL! Jinx cleans up! Cloud9 wins!
